          <title>
            <string language="en">What causes the different phases of the moon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was die unterschiedlichen Phasen des Mondes 
verursacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce qui cause les différentes phases de la lune</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa causa le fasi differenti della luna</string>

φεγγαριού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué causa las diversas fases de la luna</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which displays the Sun/Moon/Earth configuration for each phase of the moon.</string>

          </keyword>

          </description>
